title: "HitBTC"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
```

##API Url
```{r}
api <- "https://api.hitbtc.com/api/2/public/"
```

##Currency
```{r}
currency <-paste(api,"currency", sep = '')
currency.df <- fromJSON(currency)
currency.df %>% 
  count(crypto)
```

##Symbols
```{r}
symbols <-paste(api,"symbols", sep = '')
symbols.df <- fromJSON(symbols)

symbols.df %>% 
  filter(baseCurrency == "BTC")
```

##Tickers

```{r}
ticker <-paste(api,"ticker", sep = '')
ticker.df <- fromJSON(ticker)
ticker.df %>% 
  filter(grepl("BTCUSD",symbol)) 
```
## Trading history
```{r}
fromJSON("https://api.hitbtc.com/api/2/history/order?symbol=ETHBTC")
```
